subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mets starter Carlos Torres and Wilfredo Tovar, a 22-year-old shortstop prospect, helped the Mets top the Phillies and tie Philadelphia for third place in the National League East.
snippet: Mets starter Carlos Torres and Wilfredo Tovar, a 22-year-old shortstop prospect, helped the Mets top the Phillies and tie Philadelphia for third place in the National League East.
